articles.author: Stephanie Linning
articles.title: Netflix docu-series DB Cooper: Where Are You?! retells extraordinary case - Daily Mail
articles.description: The case of DB Cooper, an American hijacker who made off with $200,000 after holding a flight to ransom in 1971, has been retold in the new Netflix docu-series, DB Cooper: Where Are You?!
articles.content: Fake identities, a briefcase full of cash, a mid-flight bomb threat, and a mysterious criminal who disappears into the night, never to be seen again - it sounds like the plot of the latest Hollywood … [+10733 chars]

articles.title: ‘Richest kid in America’ flaunts lifestyle - news.com.au
articles.description: Three of America’s richest “self-made” teenagers are giving viewers an inside peek into their luxurious lives in new TV series Bling Life.
articles.content: Donald Dougher, 15, calls himself The Richest Kid in America and is estimated to be worth between $900,000 and $1.2 million.Three of America’s richest “self-made” teenagers are giving viewers an insi… [+8320 chars]
